action.action-desc: Mr. Whitehouse (for himself and Mr. Grassley) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reauthorize the Comprehensive Opioid Abuse Grant Program of the Department of Justice.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Comprehensive Addiction and Recovery Justice Grant Reauthorization Act.
